author: Opentrons
description: This protocol serially diluted compound stock with DMSO. There is an optional predilution step in this protocol. For detailed protocol steps, please see below. Slots 6, 7, 8, 9 are nest deep well plates, and slots 2, 4, 5, 10, 11 are NEST PCR plates.
labware:
NEST 12 Well Reservoir 15 mL #360102
NEST 96 Deepwell Plate 2mL #503001
Opentrons 96 Filter Tip Rack 20 µL

markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: This protocol serially diluted compound stock with DMSO. There is an optional predilution step in this protocol. For detailed protocol steps, please see below. Slots 6, 7, 8, 9 are nest deep well plates, and slots 2, 4, 5, 10, 11 are NEST PCR plates.
markdown.labware:
* [NEST 12 Well Reservoir 15 mL #360102](http://www.cell-nest.com/page94?_l=en&product_id=102)
* [NEST 96 Deepwell Plate 2mL #503001](http://www.cell-nest.com/page94?product_id=101&_l=en)
* Opentrons 96 Filter Tip Rack 20 µL
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the [Troubleshooting Survey](https://protocol-troubleshooting.paperform.co/).
markdown.process:
1. Input your protocol parameters above.
2. Download your protocol and unzip if needed.
3. Upload your custom labware to the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app) by navigating to `More` > `Custom Labware` > `Add Labware`, and selecting your labware files (.json extensions) if needed.
4. Upload your protocol file (.py extension) to the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app) in the `Protocol` tab.
5. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
6. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support articles](https://support.opentrons.com/en/collections/1559720-guide-for-getting-started-with-the-ot-2).
7. Hit "Run".
markdown.protocol-steps:
1. Transfer 2.4 uL from DMSO reservoir to columns 2-12 in Dilution Plates DMSO 1-1+2-1 , keep tips (variable step)
2. Transfer 2.4 uL from DMSO reservoir to all wells in Dilution Plates DMSO 1-2+2-2, discard tips (variable step)
Optional predilution step, dilute compounds in columns 1 and/or 2 with DMSO by a specified factor into columns 11/12 for a total volume of 20 uL (variable step)
3. Transfer 7.2 uL from column 1 of Compound Stocks to column 1 or column 11 if predilution takes place of Dilution Plate DMSO 1-1, keep tips
4. Transfer 4.8 uL from column 1 of Dilution plate DMSO 1-1 to column 2, mixing after. Repeat process, transferring from 2-3 3-4 4-5 etc mixing after each time, until transferring from 10-11 (skip 12), keep tips
5. Transfer 4.8 uL from column 11 of Dilution plate DMSO 1-1 to column 1 of Dilution Plate DMSO 1-2, mixing after, keep tips.
6. Transfer 4.8 uL from column 1 of Dilution plate DMSO 1-2 to column 2, mixing after. Repeat process, transferring from 2-3 3-4 4-5 etc mixing after each time, until transferring from 10-11 (skip 12), discard tips
7. Repeat steps 4-8 for column 2/12 of compound stocks and Dilution Plate DMSO 2-1+2-2
8. Manual tip box replacement.
9. Transfer 2.4 uL from each column of Dilution Plate DMSO 1-1 to the same column of Media Plate 1-1, discarding tips after each transfer.
10. Manual tip box replacement.
11. Repeat steps 10-11 for Dilution Plates DMSO/Media Plates 1-2, 2-1, 2-2
markdown.title: DMSO and Compound Stock Solution Addition - Part 1

notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the Troubleshooting Survey.
process:
Input your protocol parameters above.
Download your protocol and unzip if needed.
Upload your custom labware to the OT App by navigating to More > Custom Labware > Add Labware, and selecting your labware files (.json extensions) if needed.
Upload your protocol file (.py extension) to the OT App in the Protocol tab.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support articles.
Hit "Run".
protocol-steps:
Transfer 2.4 uL from DMSO reservoir to columns 2-12 in Dilution Plates DMSO 1-1+2-1 , keep tips (variable step)
Transfer 2.4 uL from DMSO reservoir to all wells in Dilution Plates DMSO 1-2+2-2, discard tips (variable step)
Optional predilution step, dilute compounds in columns 1 and/or 2 with DMSO by a specified factor into columns 11/12 for a total volume of 20 uL (variable step)
Transfer 7.2 uL from column 1 of Compound Stocks to column 1 or column 11 if predilution takes place of Dilution Plate DMSO 1-1, keep tips
Transfer 4.8 uL from column 1 of Dilution plate DMSO 1-1 to column 2, mixing after. Repeat process, transferring from 2-3 3-4 4-5 etc mixing after each time, until transferring from 10-11 (skip 12), keep tips
Transfer 4.8 uL from column 11 of Dilution plate DMSO 1-1 to column 1 of Dilution Plate DMSO 1-2, mixing after, keep tips.
Transfer 4.8 uL from column 1 of Dilution plate DMSO 1-2 to column 2, mixing after. Repeat process, transferring from 2-3 3-4 4-5 etc mixing after each time, until transferring from 10-11 (skip 12), discard tips
Repeat steps 4-8 for column 2/12 of compound stocks and Dilution Plate DMSO 2-1+2-2
Manual tip box replacement.
Transfer 2.4 uL from each column of Dilution Plate DMSO 1-1 to the same column of Media Plate 1-1, discarding tips after each transfer.
Manual tip box replacement.
Repeat steps 10-11 for Dilution Plates DMSO/Media Plates 1-2, 2-1, 2-2
title: DMSO and Compound Stock Solution Addition - Part 1
